meanings.definition: Occurring in a series of repeated events or instances.
meanings.sent1: After the umpteenth time of asking, she finally agreed to come with us.
meanings.sent2: He was tired of hearing the umpteenth excuse for being late.
meanings.sent3: The umpteenth cup of coffee finally woke him up from his daze.
meanings.sent4: The umpteenth rainstorm of the month flooded the streets.
meanings.sent5: The umpteenth rerun of the show made her realize she had seen it too many times.

meanings.definition: Used to emphasize the large number of times something has happened.
meanings.sent1: She sighed umpteenthly, feeling frustrated with the situation.
meanings.sent2: He had to fix the leaky faucet umpteenth times before it finally stopped dripping.
meanings.sent3: He umpteenthly checked his phone for any new messages, hoping for good news.
meanings.sent4: The children asked umpteenth times if they could have ice cream before dinner.
meanings.sent5: She umpteenthly reminded him to take out the trash, but he kept forgetting.
